#read the file into R
```{r}
file <- read.csv("/Users/irenecho/Desktop/final.csv", header = T)
head(file)
```

#set v2 to years column
```{r}
file$V2 <- substr(file$V2, 1,nchar(file$V2)-4)
file$V2 <- as.numeric(file$V2)
head(file)
```

#change column names
```{r}
colnames(file) <- c('station_id', 'year', 'TOBS', 'TMAX', 'TMIN', 'PRCP', 'SNOW', 'SNWD', 'totalMean', 'previous_temp')
```

#find if the temperature rose compare to the last year [TOBS, TMAX, TMIN]
```{r}
file$TOBS_is_overheated = ifelse(file$TOBS> file$previous_temp, 1, 0)

file$TMAX_is_overheated = ifelse(file$TMAX> file$previous_temp, 1, 0)

file$TMIN_is_overheated = ifelse(file$TMIN> file$previous_temp, 1, 0)

```

```{r}
head(file)
```
